mean_cn: v. 为…举行就职典礼；为展览会揭幕；开展
mean_en: to celebrate the fact that something (such as a new hospital or school) is officially ready to be used
short_phrase: inaugurate the opening of the store
sentence: By cutting this ribbon, we inaugurate the opening of the new store!
sentence_trans: 我们通过剪彩给新商店举行了开业仪式。
